articles.title: Is This Warren Buffett's Favorite Stock? (Hint: It's Not Apple)
articles.content: Warren Buffett has greatly trimmed his position in Apple, but has never sold a share of American Express since buying it in 1991. American Express has a strong brand, entrenched infrastructure, and an inflation hedge that make it an attractive long-term investment for Buffett.

articles.title: Best Large-Cap Tech Stock to Buy: Google vs. Apple vs. Microsoft
articles.content: The Motley Fool is a financial services company founded in 1993, dedicated to providing investing solutions, free guidance, and market analysis to millions of people through its website, podcasts, and non-profit foundation.

articles.title: Could Investing $1,000 in Apple Make You a Millionaire?
articles.content: The article discusses Apple's strong brand, customer loyalty, and financial performance, but notes that the current valuation may make it difficult for a $1,000 investment to turn into a million dollars. It also mentions Berkshire Hathaway's stake in Apple.

articles.title: China's state media praise some U.S. firms amid fears of a new trade war
articles.content: China's state media have praised some U.S. firms for strong collaboration - commentary that comes amid fears of a trade war and is reminiscent of how tensions with the U.S. were covered by Chinese...

articles.title: Google Seeks to Undo Epic Games Antitrust Win Over App Store
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Alphabet Inc.’s Google is asking a federal appeals court to throw out a ruling in an antitrust case brought by Fortnite-maker Epic Games that would force the search giant to overhaul its Play mobile app store. articles.title: Black Friday shopping: Where to find the best tech deals
articles.content: As Black Friday and Cyber Monday draw near, retailers across various industries are gearing up with compelling deals and promotions designed to attract consumer attention. Yahoo Finance Tech Editor Dan Howley details the most attractive consumer tech and electronic offerings for the holiday shopping season, particularly in the gaming, TV, and PC categories. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Angel Smith

articles.title: QQQ: Nvidia's Huang Warns About AI -- This Could Burst The Bubble
articles.content: Investors should sell the tech-heavy Invesco QQQ Trust ETF in response to Huang's warning. Click here to read an analysis of QQQ ETF here.
